overview: Blue Blake returns with another classic in Muscle Penitentiary which is shot in a documentary style and catalogues the torment that prison inmates suffer at the hands of their guards and other inmates. The film features the hottest team Blue Blake has ever worked with - seven muscle-bound studs that love to get fucked, drink cum and generally used! Jim Slade is topped by Jake Gianelli and, in one of the most shocking scenes in recent memory, is double penetrated by horse hung Chad Hunt and Brazilian newcomer Carlo Cox. Muscle Penitentiary is the most hardcore of Blue's movies to date and is not for the faint of heart.
tagline: Ever wondered what really goes on behind bars?
title: Muscle Penitentiary
